item.title: Pop Pop Chaos now has variable bubble prices
item.description: 15:48 Wednesday 04 November 2015 JST Pop Pop Chaos now has variable bubble prices! The price to create a bubble actually goes negative if there are fewer than 30 bubbles, and gets quite expensive if there are more than like 200. https://www.poppopchaos.com/ 18:55 Wednesday 04 November 2015 JST Chris and I played Pop Pop Chaos in the French bakery in 新杉田駅. He hadn’t seen the variable pricing on bubbles (cause I just implemented it last night or so).

item.title: Pop Pop Chaos bubbles now auto-inflate!
item.description: 13:09 Wednesday 23 September 2015 JST Sweet! It only works on PC for now, but mouseover the bubbles and the inflate to max capacity. Single click to pop them! The mouseover calls touchBubble repeatedly via an Interval (repeatedly calls a function every n milliseconds). It seems that if I tell the code inside the interval to burst the bubble, it doesn’t have access to the Meteor.user() value, so the user cannot get points for bursting the bubble.

item.title: Pop Pop Chaos now has rolling leaderboard
item.description: 20:00 Monday 21 September 2015 JST Yay! Pop Pop Chaos now has a 7-day leaderboard. Each user’s points accumulate by date, and the last 7 days are summed to make the leaderboard scores. This allows new players a chance to shine, and encourages all players to keep playing! Because it’s kinda moe joe to clickclickclick so much, I might make bubbles inflate just with mouseover, and click will create new bubbles.

item.title: Pop Pop Chaos can be played anonymously
item.description: 13:54 Friday 04 September 2015 JST Posted at https://forums.meteor.com/t/new-easy-silly-game-pop-pop-chaos-my-first-mmo/9295 If you have time to click click click some colorful bubbles, check out my new game https://www.poppopchaos.com/ Click bubbles to inflate them; the one who pops the bubble gets the points! Reach the leaderboard by creating bubbles with your hard earned points! Thanks to https://github.com/brettle/meteor-accounts-deluxe, you can play anonymously! Feedback welcome.

item.title: Pop Pop Chaos
item.description: 21:41 Tuesday 28 July 2015 JST Lin suggested the name a couple days ago. I had called it Pop Pop Pop and described the game. Everyone’s touching / clicking bubbles at the same time. She goes, “it’s pop chaos!” and I was like, “yep!” and immediately changed the title of the app to Pop Pop Chaos. (“Pop Chaos” sounds like “Pop music” but it’s not popular chaos; it’s pop pop chaos like popping bubbles!
